title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 507 - Health Supervision And Medical Care For Children
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 507 - Health Supervision And Medical Care For Children

State Regulations
§ 507.1 - General responsibilities for health supervision and medical care for children
§ 507.2 - Special assessments, examinations and tests required for children in foster care
§ 507.3 - Payment for health supervision and care
§ 507.4 - Medical rehabilitation and mental health
§ 507.5 - Emergency medical treatment for children in foster care

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 507

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 350, 364, 365-a, 373-a, 383-c, 384, 398, 409-e, 462; Family Court Act, art. 10-A, §
1017; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
